summary: A configurable convolutional downsampling layer that reduces spatial resolution of tensors (1D, 2D, or 3D) by applying split-wise convolutions along a chosen dimension, with optional GPU memory‑saving features.
business_intent: Offer an efficient, memory‑aware downsampling component for deep learning models to accelerate training and inference while preserving important feature information, suitable for deployment in resource‑constrained environments.
